quiz.question: carve _ ______
quiz.explanation: 雕刻, 雕刻雕像. The sculptor spent months trying to carve a statue from marble. 雕塑家花了数月时间试图从大理石中雕刻一座雕像。

quiz.question: ____ ___'_ nerve
quiz.explanation: 神经, 失去勇气. The climber began to lose one's nerve halfway up the cliff. 登山者在半山腰开始失去勇气。

quiz.question: ____ reserve
quiz.explanation: 储备, 现金储备. The company maintained a healthy cash reserve for emergencies. 公司为紧急情况维持了健康的现金储备。

quiz.question: conserve ______
quiz.explanation: 保存, 节约能源. We must conserve energy to reduce our carbon footprint. 我们必须节约能源以减少碳足迹。

quiz.question: ________ verve
quiz.explanation: 热情, 艺术热情. The painter approached each canvas with artistic verve. 画家以艺术热情对待每一幅画布。

quiz.question: ewe ____
quiz.explanation: 母羊, 母羊和羔羊. The shepherd watched over the ewe lamb in the meadow. 牧羊人在草地上照看母羊和羔羊。

quiz.question: faze ___
quiz.explanation: 使困扰, 使他困扰. The criticism didn't faze him in the slightest. 批评丝毫没有使他困扰。

quiz.question: raze _ ________
quiz.explanation: 夷平, 夷平建筑物. Developers plan to raze a building to make room for new construction. 开发商计划夷平一栋建筑物以腾出空间进行新建设。

quiz.question: squeeze ____
quiz.explanation: 挤压, 挤压管子. She had to squeeze tube to get the last bit of toothpaste. 她不得不挤压管子以获得最后一点牙膏。

quiz.question: _____ frieze
quiz.explanation: 饰带, 石雕饰带. The ancient temple featured an elaborate stone frieze. 古代寺庙有精美的石雕饰带。

quiz.question: ______ maize
quiz.explanation: 玉米, 黄玉米. Farmers harvested fields of golden yellow maize. 农民收获了金黄色的玉米田。

quiz.question: ostracize _ ______
quiz.explanation: 排斥, 排斥成员. The group voted to ostracize a member who violated their rules. 该团体投票决定排斥违反规则的成员。

quiz.question: publicize ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 宣传, 宣传活动. The organizers used social media to publicize the event. 组织者使用社交媒体来宣传活动。

quiz.question: oxidize _______
quiz.explanation: 氧化, 快速氧化. Iron will oxidize rapidly when exposed to moisture. 铁暴露在潮湿环境中会快速氧化。

quiz.question: gormandize __
quiz.explanation: 狼吞虎咽, 狼吞虎咽地吃. The guests continued to gormandize on the lavish buffet. 客人们继续狼吞虎咽地吃着丰盛的自助餐。

quiz.question: aggrandize _____
quiz.explanation: 扩大, 扩大权力. The dictator sought to aggrandize power at every opportunity. 独裁者试图在每一个机会扩大权力。

quiz.question: eulogize ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 称赞, 称赞逝者. Friends gathered to eulogize the dead at the memorial service. 朋友们聚集在追悼会上称赞逝者。

quiz.question: specialize __
quiz.explanation: 专门从事, 专门从事于. The law firm decided to specialize in corporate litigation. 这家律师事务所决定专门从事公司诉讼。

quiz.question: materialize _____
quiz.explanation: 实现, 实现梦想. Hard work helped materialize dream of owning a business. 努力工作帮助实现了拥有企业的梦想。

quiz.question: penalize _ ____
quiz.explanation: 惩罚, 惩罚球队. The referee decided to penalize a team for unsportsmanlike conduct. 裁判决定因不当行为惩罚球队。

quiz.question: externalize _____
quiz.explanation: 外部化, 外部化成本. Companies often try to externalize costs onto society. 公司经常试图将成本外部化给社会。

quiz.question: generalize ____
quiz.explanation: 概括, 概括规则. Scientists attempt to generalize rule from specific observations. 科学家试图从具体观察中概括规则。

quiz.question: demoralize ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 使士气低落, 使团队士气低落. The crushing defeat threatened to demoralize the team. 惨败威胁要使团队士气低落。

quiz.question: decentralize _____
quiz.explanation: 分散, 分散权力. The reform aimed to decentralize power from the capital. 改革旨在将权力从首都分散出去。

quiz.question: capitalize __
quiz.explanation: 利用, 利用. Smart investors know how to capitalize on market opportunities. 聪明的投资者知道如何利用市场机会。

quiz.question: vitalize ___ _______
quiz.explanation: 使充满活力, 使经济充满活力. New policies were designed to vitalize the economy. 新政策旨在使经济充满活力。

quiz.question: revitalize ________
quiz.explanation: 振兴, 振兴市中心. The city invested millions to revitalize downtown. 该市投资数百万美元来振兴市中心。

quiz.question: sterilize _________
quiz.explanation: 消毒, 消毒设备. Medical staff must sterilize equipment before each surgery. 医务人员必须在每次手术前消毒设备。

quiz.question: fossilize _______
quiz.explanation: 使成化石, 使遗骸成化石. Over millions of years, minerals fossilize remains of ancient creatures. 经过数百万年,矿物质使古代生物的遗骸成为化石。

quiz.question: fertilize ____
quiz.explanation: 施肥, 给土壤施肥. Farmers fertilize soil to improve crop yields. 农民给土壤施肥以提高作物产量。

quiz.question: utilize _________
quiz.explanation: 利用, 利用资源. The company learned to utilize resources more efficiently. 公司学会了更有效地利用资源。

quiz.question: monopolize _________
quiz.explanation: 垄断, 垄断注意力. The speaker tended to monopolize attention at meetings. 演讲者往往在会议上垄断注意力。

quiz.question: victimize ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 使受害, 使弱者受害. Criminals often victimize the weak and vulnerable. 罪犯经常使弱者和弱势群体受害。

quiz.question: maximize ______
quiz.explanation: 最大化, 最大化利润. Businesses aim to maximize profit while minimizing costs. 企业旨在最大化利润同时最小化成本。

quiz.question: epitomize __________
quiz.explanation: 体现, 体现卓越. Her performance seemed to epitomize excellence in every way. 她的表现似乎在各方面都体现了卓越。

quiz.question: galvanize _______
quiz.explanation: 激励, 激励支持. The crisis helped galvanize support for reform. 危机帮助激励了对改革的支持。

quiz.question: homogenize ____
quiz.explanation: 使均质, 使牛奶均质. Dairies homogenize milk to prevent cream separation. 乳制品厂使牛奶均质以防止奶油分离。

quiz.question: desalinize _____
quiz.explanation: 淡化, 淡化水. Coastal cities build plants to desalinize water from the ocean. 沿海城市建造工厂从海洋中淡化水。

quiz.question: scrutinize ____
quiz.explanation: 仔细检查, 仔细检查数据. Auditors will scrutinize data for any irregularities. 审计员会仔细检查数据以寻找任何违规行为。

quiz.question: antagonize _________
quiz.explanation: 对抗, 对抗邻居. His loud parties continued to antagonize neighbors. 他吵闹的派对继续对抗邻居。

quiz.question: lionize _ ____
quiz.explanation: 崇拜, 崇拜英雄. The media began to lionize a hero who saved the child. 媒体开始崇拜拯救孩子的英雄。

quiz.question: colonize ____
quiz.explanation: 殖民, 殖民火星. Space agencies discuss plans to colonize Mars in the future. 航天机构讨论未来殖民火星的计划。

quiz.question: sermonize __ ______
quiz.explanation: 说教, 长篇说教. The politician would sermonize at length about moral values. 这位政客会长篇大论地说教道德价值观。

quiz.question: plagiarize _ _____
quiz.explanation: 剽窃, 剽窃论文. The student was expelled for attempting to plagiarize a paper. 这名学生因试图剽窃论文而被开除。

quiz.question: polarize _______
quiz.explanation: 使两极化, 使意见两极化. The controversial issue continued to polarize opinion nationwide. 这个有争议的问题继续使全国意见两极化。

quiz.question: particularize _______
quiz.explanation: 详述, 详述细节. The witness was asked to particularize details of what happened. 证人被要求详述发生的细节。

quiz.question: bowdlerize _ ____
quiz.explanation: 删改, 删改文本. Victorian editors would bowdlerize a text to remove offensive content. 维多利亚时代的编辑会删改文本以删除冒犯性内容。

quiz.question: characterize ________
quiz.explanation: 描述, 描述行为. Psychologists study factors that characterize behavior patterns. 心理学家研究描述行为模式的因素。

quiz.question: cauterize _____
quiz.explanation: 烧灼, 烧灼伤口. Surgeons may cauterize wound to stop bleeding. 外科医生可能烧灼伤口以止血。

quiz.question: pulverize ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 粉碎, 粉碎岩石. Heavy machinery can pulverize the rock into fine powder. 重型机械可以将岩石粉碎成细粉末。

quiz.question: satirize ________
quiz.explanation: 讽刺, 讽刺政治. The comedian used his show to satirize politics. 喜剧演员利用他的节目来讽刺政治。

quiz.question: vaporize _____
quiz.explanation: 使蒸发, 使水蒸发. High temperatures will vaporize water instantly. 高温会使水立即蒸发。

quiz.question: temporize ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 拖延, 拖延时间. The negotiator tried to temporize for time while awaiting instructions. 谈判代表试图拖延时间等待指示。

quiz.question: extemporize _______
quiz.explanation: 即兴发言, 即兴发言. When his notes were lost, he had to extemporize remarks. 当他的笔记丢失时,他不得不即兴发言。

quiz.question: idolatrize ____
quiz.explanation: 崇拜, 崇拜名望. Society tends to idolatrize fame and celebrity. 社会倾向于崇拜名望和名人。

quiz.question: pasteurize ____
quiz.explanation: 巴氏消毒, 巴氏消毒牛奶. Dairies pasteurize milk to kill harmful bacteria. 乳制品厂对牛奶进行巴氏消毒以杀死有害细菌。

quiz.question: capsize _ ____
quiz.explanation: 倾覆, 使船倾覆. Strong winds threatened to capsize a boat in rough seas. 强风威胁要在波涛汹涌的海面上使船倾覆。

quiz.question: schematize ____
quiz.explanation: 使系统化, 使想法系统化. The professor tried to schematize idea into a clear framework. 教授试图将想法系统化为一个清晰的框架。

quiz.question: stigmatize _ _____
quiz.explanation: 污名化, 污名化群体. Society should not stigmatize a group based on stereotypes. 社会不应该基于刻板印象污名化群体。

quiz.question: sensitize ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 使敏感, 使公众敏感. The campaign aimed to sensitize the public to environmental issues. 这项运动旨在使公众对环境问题敏感。

quiz.question: amortize _ ____
quiz.explanation: 分期偿还, 分期偿还贷款. Homeowners typically amortize a loan over thirty years. 房主通常在三十年内分期偿还贷款。

quiz.question: deputize _______
quiz.explanation: 授权, 授权警官. The sheriff had authority to deputize officer in emergencies. 警长有权在紧急情况下授权警官。

quiz.question: proselytize ________
quiz.explanation: 劝人改宗, 劝人改信宗教. Missionaries traveled abroad to proselytize religion. 传教士出国劝人改信宗教。

quiz.question: paralyze ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 使瘫痪, 使系统瘫痪. The cyberattack threatened to paralyze the system completely. 网络攻击威胁要使系统完全瘫痪。

quiz.question: ____ chef
quiz.explanation: 厨师, 主厨. The head chef supervises all kitchen operations. 主厨监督所有厨房操作。

quiz.question: debrief _______
quiz.explanation: 询问, 询问士兵. Officers would debrief soldier after each mission. 军官会在每次任务后询问士兵。

quiz.question: ____________ grief
quiz.explanation: 悲痛, 压倒性的悲痛. The family experienced overwhelming grief after the loss. 家人在失去亲人后经历了压倒性的悲痛。

quiz.question: ________ ___ chaff
quiz.explanation: 谷壳, 分离谷壳. The winnowing process helps separate the chaff from grain. 簸谷过程有助于将谷壳与谷物分离。

quiz.question: quaff ___
quiz.explanation: 痛饮, 痛饮麦芽酒. Thirsty travelers stopped at the tavern to quaff ale. 口渴的旅行者在小酒馆停下来痛饮麦芽酒。

quiz.question: _______ skiff
quiz.explanation: 小船, 渔船. The old fisherman rowed his small fishing skiff to shore. 老渔夫划着他的小渔船上岸。

quiz.question: ______ sheriff
quiz.explanation: 警长, 县警长. The county sheriff was elected to maintain law and order. 县警长被选举来维持法律和秩序。

quiz.question: _____'_ tiff
quiz.explanation: 争吵, 情侣争吵. They had a minor lover's tiff but reconciled quickly. 他们发生了一场小情侣争吵但很快和解了。

quiz.question: plaintiff ________
quiz.explanation: 原告, 原告律师. The plaintiff attorney presented compelling evidence to the jury. 原告律师向陪审团提出了令人信服的证据。

quiz.question: stiff _______
quiz.explanation: 严厉的, 严厉的惩罚. The judge imposed a stiff penalty for the serious offense. 法官对严重罪行施加了严厉的惩罚。

quiz.question: doff ___'_ ___
quiz.explanation: 脱下, 脱下帽子. Gentlemen would doff one's hat when greeting a lady. 绅士在问候女士时会脱下帽子。

quiz.question: bluff ____
quiz.explanation: 虚张声势, 要求摊牌. The poker player decided to bluff call on a weak hand. 扑克玩家决定用弱牌虚张声势要求摊牌。

quiz.question: ______ foodstuff
quiz.explanation: 食品, 主食. Rice is a staple foodstuff in many Asian countries. 大米是许多亚洲国家的主食。

quiz.question: _________ motif
quiz.explanation: 主题, 反复出现的主题. The novel featured a recurring motif of water and rebirth. 小说以水和重生为反复出现的主题。

quiz.question: ___-______ pelf
quiz.explanation: 不义之财, 不义之财. The corrupt official amassed ill-gotten pelf through bribes. 腐败官员通过贿赂积累了不义之财。

quiz.question: _____ reproof
quiz.explanation: 责备, 严厉的责备. The teacher delivered a stern reproof for the student's behavior. 老师因学生的行为给予了严厉的责备。

quiz.question: _______ disproof
quiz.explanation: 反证, 逻辑反证. The scientist provided logical disproof of the hypothesis. 科学家提供了该假设的逻辑反证。

quiz.question: ____ scarf
quiz.explanation: 围巾, 丝绸围巾. She wrapped a luxurious silk scarf around her neck. 她在脖子上围了一条奢华的丝绸围巾。

quiz.question: ______ dwarf
quiz.explanation: 矮人, 花园矮人. A colorful garden dwarf stood among the flowers. 一个色彩鲜艳的花园矮人站在花丛中。

quiz.question: ____-______ windbag
quiz.explanation: 夸夸其谈的人, 长篇大论的夸夸其谈者. The long-winded windbag monopolized the entire meeting. 这个长篇大论的夸夸其谈者垄断了整个会议。

quiz.question: fag ___
quiz.explanation: 末端, 末端. They arrived at the fag end of the performance. 他们在演出的末端到达。

quiz.question: ___ lag
quiz.explanation: 时差, 时差反应. International travelers often suffer from jet lag. 国际旅行者经常遭受时差反应。

quiz.question: flag ________
quiz.explanation: 减弱, 兴趣减弱. Audience attention began to flag interest halfway through the speech. 观众的注意力在演讲进行到一半时开始兴趣减弱。

quiz.question: ________ slag
quiz.explanation: 熔渣, 冶炼熔渣. Industrial smelting slag must be disposed of properly. 工业冶炼熔渣必须妥善处理。

quiz.question: rag ____
quiz.explanation: 破布, 布娃娃. The child clutched her beloved rag doll. 孩子紧紧抓着她心爱的布娃娃。

quiz.question: brag _____
quiz.explanation: 吹嘘, 吹嘘关于. He would constantly brag about his accomplishments. 他会不断吹嘘自己的成就。

quiz.question: _____ crag
quiz.explanation: 峭壁, 岩石峭壁. Eagles nest on the steep rocky crag. 鹰在陡峭的岩石峭壁上筑巢。

quiz.question: _____ tag
quiz.explanation: 标签, 价格标签. The price tag showed the item was on sale. 价格标签显示该商品正在促销。

quiz.question: ___ rig
quiz.explanation: 钻井平台, 石油钻井平台. Workers on the offshore oil rig work in shifts. 海上石油钻井平台的工人轮班工作。

quiz.question: ____-_________ prig
quiz.explanation: 自命清高的人, 自命清高的人. The self-righteous prig criticized everyone's behavior. 这个自命清高的人批评每个人的行为。

quiz.question: sprig __ ____
quiz.explanation: 小枝, 薄荷小枝. She garnished the drink with a fresh sprig of mint. 她用一枝新鲜的薄荷装饰饮料。

quiz.question: ________ wig
quiz.explanation: 假发, 扑粉假发. Colonial gentlemen wore elegant powdered wig. 殖民时期的绅士戴着优雅的扑粉假发。

quiz.question: bracing ___
quiz.explanation: 令人振奋的, 令人振奋的空气. The bracing air of the mountains invigorated the hikers. 山间令人振奋的空气使徒步旅行者精神焕发。

quiz.question: ____ icing
quiz.explanation: 糖霜, 蛋糕糖霜. The baker decorated the cake icing with intricate designs. 面包师用复杂的图案装饰蛋糕糖霜。

quiz.question: entrancing ___________
quiz.explanation: 迷人的, 迷人的表演. The ballet dancer gave an entrancing performance. 芭蕾舞演员呈现了一场迷人的表演。

quiz.question: ____ fencing
quiz.explanation: 击剑, 花剑击剑. She competed in foil fencing at the Olympics. 她在奥运会上参加了花剑击剑比赛。
